DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize , multi-center，crossover study domestic FM peritoneal dialysis machine Baxter HOMECHOICE.It aim verify safety , effectiveness manipulability domestic peritoneal dialysis machine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Effectiveness Manipulability Evaluation Domestic PD Machine
DOC.detailed_description: Our study randomize , multi-center，crossover study . It compare domestic FM peritoneal dialysis machine Baxter HOMECHOICE.It aim verify safety , effectiveness manipulability domestic peritoneal dialysis machine .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 , male female Dialysis duration : ≥30 day Sign write informed consent Hemodialysis Exit site infection tunnel infection Peritonitis ≤30 day screen Catheter mechanical failure AntiHIV positive Allergic component dialysate Comorbidity : Active , residual malignant tumor , systemic infection , liver cirrhosis , severe congestive heart failure , hypertension Poor compliance Pregnant lactating , woman childbearing age agree use effective contraceptive measure trial Has history alcoholism drug abuse ( define illegal drug ) Any circumstance patient believe unsuitable trial
